hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: Will I be paid weekly or monthly? rdd pharma orbimed Paid sabbaticals average about two months in duration, while unpaid stints are "all over the map," according to Elizabeth Pagano McGuire, a founding partner at the consulting firm yourSABBATICAL, which helps companies design the programs. They appeal most of all to a younger demographic: Younger generations hold very different work attitudes than their older counterparts, including valuing time off, according to studies by Dr. Jean Twenge of San Diego State University.
